main event: On December 7, 1958, Mr. and Mrs. Walter Sanders observed a bright, round, orange-colored object moving swiftly before hovering over their home.
interesting points: The object changed color from orange to bluish-white while hovering,The object was estimated to be 30-40 feet in diameter,The speed of the object was estimated to be between 1500 to 2000 mph,The sighting lasted approximately 10-15 minutes,Other residents in the area also reported seeing the object.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Walter Sanders residing at 1231 East Citrus Avenue
